plugin.name: App Availability Whitelist Info Plist For Carpoolnow
plugin.author: Brian Nguyen (https://github.com/brian3t)
plugin.description: Cordova / PhoneGap Plugin to add whitelist to the Info.plist file in order to use AppAvailability on the iOS 9.2 and above changes, for app Carpoolnow

config-file.string: Your current location will be used to match you to riders and drivers in your area. Once a ride has begun it will also be used to provide estimated travel times.
